WorkItem.Description:
In "MonitorWindowModel.cs", _graphWindowTicks is defined as:
_graphWindowTicks =
                from tick in _tickerData
                where tick.TimeStamp >= DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(-5) &&
                      tick.Symbol == "AAPL"
                select tick; // return last 5 minutes worth of ticks for AAPL */
Â 
With my understanding of CLINQ, this doesn't accomplish what I would expect. This ContinuousCollection continues to grow, regardless of elapsed time window. This is a very valuable capability and I would be very interested in knowing how to efficiently achieve the behavior found in the code comment.
